one_location: {party} established their primary residence in {location} on {date}.
The relocation of {party} to {location} occurred on {date}.
{date} is the date {party} moved their primary dwelling to {location}.
The primary residence of {party} was located in {location} beginning on {date}.
{party} chose to relocate their household to {location} on {date}.
{party} moved their permanent residence on {date} to {location}.
Starting on {date}, the principal place of residence of {party} was located in {location}.
{party} transferred their domicile to {location} as of {date}.
As of {date}, {party} established their domiciled in {location}.
two_locations: {party} began living in {location} on {date}, but relocated to {location} on {date}.
Starting on {date}, {party} lived in {location} but later moved their primary residence on {date} to {location}.
On {date}, {party} established their home in {location}, though later shifted their residence to {location} on {date}.
After moving their household to {location} on {date}, {party} eventually relocated to {location} on {date}.
{location} was the location of their principal place of residence starting on {date}, until {party} transferred to {location} on {date}.
